title: Bit_Happy
author: Bit_Happy
created_time: December 11, 2023, 08:21:00 AMLast edit: December 11, 2023, 12:05:06 PM by Bit_Happy
content: #Please pay attention to the simple and valuable details here. I have over 45 students/staff eagerly waiting for a modest amount of early funding. We don't need to "move the crowd" right away. We only need ~1 to 10 savvy individuals who understand, when I finally break through you do not want to be left behind by failing to act today, thank you. As deaths of homeless people rise, L.A. to appoint new leader to tackle crisisHomeless Token (HOME)Fast Facts:* Homelessness is currently a huge problem in many parts of the USA, how are things in your town?* Standing alone this project doesn't sound like a source of Massive New Wealth, but as a small piece of a very Big Picture how does it look? * Our community and ecosystem has earned a terrible reputation in many areas of the mainstream world. We (some of you) earned it with an endless parade of scams, and most of you know this is true.* Imagine a successful Ten Seeds network with (literally) a Super Bowl Ad showing how much we help some of these people. The great publicity would be worth much more than the cost of the ad + actually helping some people before they literally die from suffering in cold, horrible conditions.# We are developing a decentralized Massive Global Escrow, so Ten Seeds can be powerful and trustless* network, and enjoy a reality where "Almost Anything Is Possible." *Trustless in Crypto: The concept of trustlessness is a core element of blockchain, crypto payments, and smart contracts. “Trustless” means that you don't have to trust a third party.More details on this project provided later: For now, the forward-thinking people we need can please start here:     (Video Just Released) 2048: The World's First Long-Term, Paid Study of Bitcoin users.  That topic is pretty long and very informative, please turn on your brain and do your due diligence.Thank you, and have a great day.
